Title: Durapipe VXE ABS/EPDM ball valve 20mm
Description: Suitable for chilled and cold water applications, this Durapipe SuperFLO ABS 20mm ball valve with EPDM seals is part of a WRAS approved range for low temperature fluid transport. The SuperFLO range is ideal for multistorey buildings, care homes, student accommodation and other multi-occupancy dwellings, providing a wide operational temperature range as well as resistance to corrosion and limescale. These practical features ensure that SuperFLO systems maintain consistent flow rates throughout their lifetime of use.

Title: TP VSB.22L ABS/EPDM safe double union ball valve 1.1/2"
Description: This TP VSB.22L 1 1/2 x 1 1/2" ball valve is made of high impact, highly elastic ABS and includes double union/plain socket connections and EPDM seals. Pressure ratings for thermoplastic pipe and fittings carrying water are quoted at 20°C and where the temperature increases, the working pressure must be reduced. ABS is resistant to most diluted inorganic acids, bases and salts and most animal oils and fats. A ball valve is a type of quarter-turn valve featuring a hollow, perforated ball that pivots to control the flow of a fluid. The valve is open when the ball's hole is in line with flow and closed when pivoted to 90°. The long lasting reliability of ball valves makes them popular in a wide range of settings.
